column1: '''KHEN''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "look at, see, observe, direct gaze".<ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 21 (form appearing as "KHEN- (also KEN-, KYEN-)"
column2: rejected entry "KHEN- look")</ref> The root is said to be "base of eye-words" and to be related to the root [[KEN]].<ref name=PE>{{PE|Eldarin}}, pp. 157, 187 (form appearing as "√KHEN." and "√KHEN")</ref>
